name: Cricket, Anyone?
storyline: The Tournament of Toasts! The greatest cricket match of the season! And the perfect opportunity for Benthic and Summerset College to tear each other to pieces! Grab a bat, grab a drink, but keep your wits sharp: the stakes are higher than they seem.
summary: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2019. Third and final entry in the Season of Hobbies.
